channel.title: Motivation on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: I am Remarkable, and so are You!
item.description: On November 9th, I went to a workshop at Google called #IamRemarkable for “Women in Cloud”, facilitated by Gautami Nadkarni and Naomi Klamen.

item.title: How Waiting Tables Set Me Up for Success
item.description: I believe everyone should spend some time working in the service industry at some point in their lives.
